info.name: [SD] Handy API requests
info.description:
This collection contains a set of handful requests ready to use. **Don't use the runner** for this collection, just execute the request you need. Some notes:

- Required fields are identified by a comment on the description field
- Not required fields are disabled by default
- Array parameters have brackets "_\[ \]_" after their name. If you have multiple values, create a new parameter with the exact same name and brackets.
- If the request can handle attachments, you'll find the parameter in "_Body_" tab
    

Author: Hern√°n Aranda (a.k.a. Hernium)

# Prerequisites

Check this article to prepare everything you need: [https://github.com/hernan-aranda/invgate-implementor-toolbox#how-to-use-this-resources](https://github.com/hernan-aranda/invgate-implementor-toolbox#how-to-use-this-resources)

# Execution

1. Set and select the enviroment, or replace the enviroment variables with your constants
2. Complete the values of the parameters
3. Execute the request
    

# Requests

item.name: Breaking News

request.description:
Creates Breaking News.

Endpoint doc.: [https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#breakingnews-POST](https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#breakingnews-POST)

Returns the requested Breaking News.

Endpoint doc.: [https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#breakingnews-GET](https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#breakingnews-GET)

Lists all the Breaking News.

Endpoint doc.: [](https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#breakingnews-GET)[https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#breakingnewsall-GET](https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#breakingnewsall-GET)

Lists all the possible status for the Breaking News' and their descriptions. If an ID is provided, only one will be listed.

Endpoint doc.: [](https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#breakingnews-GET)[https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#breakingnewsattributesstatus-GET](https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#breakingnewsattributesstatus-GET)

Lists all the importance types of the Breaking News. If an ID its provided, only one will be listed.

Endpoint doc.: [https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#breakingnewsattributestype-GET](https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#breakingnewsattributestype-GET)

item.description: Requests related to Breaking News feature.

request.description:
Lists all the categories, or the required one if an ID is provided.

Endpoint doc.: [https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#categories-GET](https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#categories-GET)

Configures list type custom fields. If the key already exists, the previous value will be overwritten.

Endpoint doc.: [https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#cffieldoptionslist-POST](https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#cffieldoptionslist-POST)

Lists the configuration of custom fields that are a list type.

Endpoint doc.: [https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#cffieldoptionslist-GET](https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#cffieldoptionslist-GET)

Adds configuration to the tree type custom fields. If the key already exists, the previous value will be overwritten.

Endpoint doc.: [https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#cffieldoptionstree-POST](https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#cffieldoptionstree-POST)

Returns the structure of the tree type custom fields options. The hash is system internal, but it is used to make modifications.

Endpoint doc.: [https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#cffieldoptionstree-GET](https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#cffieldoptionstree-GET)

Returns a list of all the active custom fields.

Endpoint doc.: [https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#cffieldsall-GET](https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#cffieldsall-GET)

Returns a list of the custom fields related to a category ID.

Endpoint doc.: [https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#cffieldsbycategory-GET](https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#cffieldsbycategory-GET)

Returns a list of all the supported custom field types, with a brief description of the data type for each field.

Endpoint doc.: [https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#cffieldstypes-GET](https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#cffieldstypes-GET)

Creates a new company.

Endpoint doc.: [https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#companies-POST](https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#companies-POST)

Returns all the active companies.

Endpoint doc.: [https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#companies-GET](https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#companies-GET)

Adds a user to a company. If the company contains groups, the users will also be added to those groups.

Endpoint doc.: [https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#companiesusers-POST](https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#companiesusers-POST)

Lists the members of a company.

Endpoint doc.: [https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#companiesusers-GET](https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#companiesusers-GET)

Creates a group of users.

Endpoint doc.: [https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#groups-POST](https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#groups-POST)

Returns all active groups of users, or one in particular if an ID or name is provided.

Endpoint doc.: [https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#groups-GET](https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#groups-GET)

Adds a user to a group.

Endpoint doc.: [https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#groupsusers-POST](https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#groupsusers-POST)

Lists the members of a group.

Endpoint doc.: [https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#groupsusers-GET](https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#groupsusers-GET)

Returns all the active help desks, or one in particular.

Endpoint doc.: [https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#helpdesks-GET](https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#helpdesks-GET)

Returns all the help desks and levels, or one in particular.

Endpoint doc.: [https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#helpdesksandlevels-GET](https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#helpdesksandlevels-GET)

item.name: Incident

request.description:
Creates a request.

Endpoint doc.: [https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#incident-POST](https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#incident-POST)

Change attributes of a request.

Endpoint doc.: [https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#incident-PUT](https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#incident-PUT)

Returns the information of the given request.

Endpoint doc.: [https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#incident-GET](https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#incident-GET)

Lists all the priorities, or only one if an ID its provided.

Endpoint doc.: [https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#incidentattributespriority-GET](https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#incidentattributespriority-GET)

Lists all the sources. If an ID is provided, only the one that matches the specified ID will be listed.

Endpoint doc.: [https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#incidentattributessource-GET](https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#incidentattributessource-GET)

Lists all the status. If an ID is provided, only the one that matches the specified ID will be listed.

Endpoint doc.: [https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#incidentattributesstatus-GET](https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#incidentattributesstatus-GET)

Lists all the types. If an ID is provided, only the one that matches the specified ID will be listed.

Endpoint doc.: [https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#incidentattributestype-GET](https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#incidentattributestype-GET)

Adds a reply to a request.

Endpoint doc.: [https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#incidentcomment-POST](https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#incidentcomment-POST)

Gets the replies from a given request.

Endpoint doc.: [https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#incidentcomment-GET](https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#incidentcomment-GET)

Creates values for a custom field from a request. Different types of data can be sent in the values variable. No value (empty string) means erase value. When sending files, the name of the file has to be in the values array (including its extension), and the file(s) itself should be sent in the body of the request.

Endpoint doc.: [https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#incidentcustom_field-POST](https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#incidentcustom_field-POST)

Relates a request to every CI that matches a certain keyword.

Endpoint doc.: [https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#incidentrelatecibykeyword-POST](https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#incidentrelatecibykeyword-POST)

item.description: Requests related to Tickets (not just "_Incidents_" in the literal way).

request.description:
Creates an article.

Endpoint doc.: [https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#kbarticles-POST](https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#kbarticles-POST)

Adds attachments to an article.

Endpoint doc.: [https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#kbarticlesattachments-POST](https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#kbarticlesattachments-POST)

Searches for articles by keywords.

Endpoint doc.: [https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#kbarticlesbykeywords-GET](https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#kbarticlesbykeywords-GET)

Lists all the Knowledge Base categories.

Endpoint doc.: [https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#kbcategories-GET](https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#kbcategories-GET)

Creates a location.

Endpoint doc.: [https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#locations-POST](https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#locations-POST)

Returns all active locations, or one in particular.

Endpoint doc.: [https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#locations-GET](https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#locations-GET)

Adds users to a location.

Endpoint doc.: [https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#locationsusers-POST](https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#locationsusers-POST)

Lists the members of a location.

Endpoint doc.: [https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#locationsusers-GET](https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#locationsusers-GET)

Retrieves the user matching the username or email and displays some basic information about the user. At least one of the input parameters is required.

Endpoint doc.: [https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#userby-GET](https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#userby-GET)

Retrieves users and displays some basic information about them. It's possible to specify an array of user IDs in order to filter specific users; otherwise, it retrieves all users.

Endpoint doc.: [https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#users-GET](https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#users-GET)

Returns the user's groups, companies, helpdesks and locations.

Endpoint doc.: [https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#usersgroups-GET](https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#usersgroups-GET)

Deploys a workflow.

Endpoint doc.: [https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#wfdeploy-PUT](https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#wfdeploy-PUT)

Lists the initial fields needed to create a request from a workflow.

Endpoint doc.: [https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#wfinitialfieldsbycategory-GET](https://releases.invgate.com/service-desk/api/#wfinitialfieldsbycategory-GET)

exec: // If we got a 200, the request was executed succesfully
